revisionDesc.change: Approximate date of original transcription and transcriber.
Migrating from P4 to validated TEI P5.

div.p: So when he came back on Wednesday he moved his things away now i have the whole bunk to myself

About 2 o clock this afternoon i received a Letter from Sarah with Jimiy enclosed in it he is home sick take and write to him Soon and persuade him to stop for a while any how i wrote him a letter to day by i did not think that he wanted home so Soon I shall take and write to Sarah Some time next week if i live There was some green Apples in market this week there has been Some Potatoes there long ago I have The weather is Pretty warm here not But no so warm as i thought for as yet
